title: MFW I actually believed Rito fixed Yasuo

replies.body: Did they not fix the Q/auto bug where you get locked out after ult and E+Q? That thing's been around forever and I was hoping they finally got rid of it.
I was so excited to hear about the bug fixes, only to realize they are more frequent now lol
Still havent a clue what MFW is lol

I think it either means my feels when, or my face when.
I might be wrong though....
People do use it for both tho, at least I do.
It's "my face when." You might have gotten it mixed up with "tfw," which is "that feel when."
